strings.Value: {n}Near Armag's tent, Amiri spots a familiar figure clad in a gray cloak. The Sister stands over Nilak, who's bound and helpless. A dagger gleams faintly in the Sister's hand.{/n}

{n}A dense red fog clouds Amiri's eyes as a roar of anger bursts from her chest. Her body rushes forward, seemingly of its own accord. Her head is empty but for a single ringing thought — kill. Kill. KILL!{/n}
{n}Dugath sits nearby — with his hands and legs tied up and his mouth gagged, he stares at the witch with eyes full of hate.{/n}
